thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: Sacramento Man Slain by Police Was Shot in Back, Family Autopsy Says

author: Zusha Elinson
title: Sacramento Man Slain by Police Was Shot in Back, Family Autopsy Says
text:
The family of Stephon Clark, the unarmed black man killed by police in Sacramento, Calif., released the results of their own autopsy report Friday, showing that six of eight bullets hit him in the back.
Mr. Clark’s death on March 18 has spurred ongoing protests in California’s capital city and beyond and has renewed scrutiny of police killings.
...
